titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I worked at my lecture all the morning: &, in the afternoon, went to Oxford for the Bursar's Dinner.
This morning the long-expected episcopal appointments were announced. They seem to be generally satisfactory.
Bp. Ryle leaves Exeter for Winchester
Bp. Lloyd becomes Bp. of Newcastle
Robertson of King's College becomes Bp. of Exeter.
